findings.title: Finance fallback function needs the transitionsPeriod modifier
findings.description: Finance fallback function needs the transitionsPeriod modifier. Otherwise, the _recordTransaction function will record the transaction in the wrong period.

findings.title: Add require to Finance.initialize that checks _vault is not null
findings.description: Add `require` to Finance.initialize that checks _vault is not null.

findings.title: Finance: setPaymentStatus does not have transitionsPeriod modifier
findings.description: The `setPaymentStatus` function in Finance doesn't have a transitionsPeriod modifier.

findings.title: The creation of a threat model is beneficial when building smart contract systems
findings.description: Creating a comprehensive threat model helps to analyze the attack surface and focus review and testing efforts on key areas that a malicious actor would likely also attack.
